channel.title: Reporting others / Ban+Warning FAQ Does NOT Go Here! Read Here 1st!
channel.description:
Posting a support ticket asking about a recent ban/warning will likely be ignored. Try here:
http://throneofli.es/banfaq
If you are wanting to report _others_, you may only do that in-game. We get 100's of reports per day and when you report someone, it includes all the evidence in a nice format and includes history, usernames, ID's, etc. Even if you have a screenshot, it takes 100x longer to process -- this is why, for the sake of hours a day already spent on reports, please ONLY report players in-game.
This also prevents drama where everyone can see reports -- if you report at the end of the screen, it's also private.
Please do not post any form of reports here ~ If you missed it, then don't worry -- chances are one of the other players got it ;)
